name: Reach The Stars
description:
The stars are the place where your dreams are stored! Don't you wanna know what is there beyond the stars? Your goal is to get as many points as you can by jumping on the stars and avoid falling down to the ground, this is where your travel starts. Red stars double your score. Control the little alien by touching the screen, it will move in the direction of your touch, so try to keep touching the screen to make it easier.

What's is coming:
*Upgrades
*Powerups
*Enemies
*Achievements
